author: lofwyr
msg: TOBAGO-1173: Refactor Scripting of the Date/Time/Calender components
- Removing Scripts and onXXX event handlers from the renderer classes.
- using data-attributes (HTML5) instead of hidden fields.
- using Tobago.registerListener for initialization of the DOM

author: rdonkin
msg: Usage documentation for generate, and switched to vm pre-processing to allow version numbers to be parameterised from the pom.

author: ilgrosso
msg: Adding commented datasource declaration for (optional) usage with WebLogic

author: harsh
msg: HDFS-3628. The dfsadmin -setBalancerBandwidth command on branch-1 does not check for superuser privileges. Contributed by Harsh J (harsh)

author: solomax
msg: - Ivy library is update to 2.3.0-rc1 (to be in sync with red5)
- Flash compiling is generalized and made working on the paths with spaces
- persistence.xml is added to ignore list
